import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class FormCreateUser extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { campName: "", campPhone:"", campEmail:"", campPassword:"", selectRole:0 } } render() { return (
this.setState({campName:value.target.value})} />
this.setState({campPhone:value.target.value})}/>
this.setState({campEmail:value.target.value})}/>
this.setState({campPassword:value.target.value})}/>
) } }
